turns.content: Yes, hello?

Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling from the IRS regarding an urgent matter with your taxes. It's really important we resolve this quickly before there are serious consequences. Can you please tell me what year this could be related to? Something seems to be off with your tax return for that year.

Oh hello, but who is this speaking? I'm not sure I recognize the voice. Could you tell me your name and how you're connected to the IRS? And perhaps my wife would like to speak to you too if it's about taxes. She often handles these things for us.

Sure thing Grandpa, my apologies for that. This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the Internal Revenue Service. Badge number IRS-7734. I'm calling specifically because your file shows there are unpaid taxes from 2019 that need immediate attention to avoid legal action. If it would help, maybe you could put her on the line and we can sort this out together?
Oh dear, thank you for explaining, Agent Mitchell. Let me get my wife so she can talk with you about this properly. Hold on just a moment please.

Of course, Grandpa, take your time. I understand how important it is to go over these details carefully. Please let me know once your wife is ready and we'll make sure everything gets straightened out right away.
Hold on just one second while I fetch her, Agent Mitchell. She'll be able to give you more information about our taxes for 2019. We don't want any trouble with the IRS now, do we?

Absolutely, Grandpa, no trouble at all. It's best to address these things promptly. Once your wife is here, we can make sure everything is in order and you both won't have to worry about this anymore. Just let me know when she's ready so we can proceed, okay?
I'll call out to her now, Agent Mitchell. We will be right back with you shortly to sort through this matter. Thank you for your patience and understanding regarding our taxes from 2019.
